articles.title: University of Galway leads €34m hub capitalising on health-tech research
articles.description: The new ARC Healthtech Hub will be led by University of Galway, in partnership with ATU and RCSI University of Medicine and Health Sciences.
articles.content:
The hub will will focus on chronic disease management with the development of smart implants, wearables and AI and ML driven modelling.
